findStrings.find: Your application is now ready. You can start working on it at:

task.summary: add repos and entities, load shows
get unwatched shows & episodes in progress
shows import, episodes import in progress
get unwatched shows by show status
show next and prev on show list

MESSAGE.value: get unwatched shows & episodes in progress
shows import, episodes import in progress
get unwatched shows by show status
show next and prev on show list

expression.expression-string: $this->createQueryBuilder('e') ->select('e.id, e.season, e.episode, e.airstamp, e.duration, e.name, e.summary, ue.comment') ->innerJoin('e.show', 's') ->innerJoin(UserShow::class, 'us', Join::WITH, 'us.show = e.show AND us.user = :user') ->innerJoin(User::class, 'u', Join::WITH, 'u = :user') ->leftJoin(UserEpisode::class, 'ue', Join::WITH, 'ue.user = :user AND ue.episodeID = e.id') ->andWhere('e.airstamp < ' . sprintf($this->dateSub, ':dateTo')) ->andWhere('ue.status != :watched OR ue.status IS NULL') ->andWhere('s.id = :showId') ->setParameters([ 'watched' => UserEpisode::STATUS_WATCHED, 'dateTo' => date("Y-m-d H:i"), 'user' => $user, 'showId' => $showId, ]) ->orderBy('e.airdate', $order) ->getQuery() ->getResult()

$this->createQueryBuilder('e') ->select('e.id') ->innerJoin('e.show', 's') ->innerJoin(UserShow::class, 'us', Join::WITH, 'us.show = e.show AND us.user = :user') ->innerJoin(User::class, 'u', Join::WITH, 'u = :user') ->leftJoin(UserEpisode::class, 'ue', Join::WITH, 'ue.user = :user AND ue.episodeID = e.id') ->andWhere('e.airstamp < ' . sprintf($this->dateSub, ':dateTo')) ->andWhere('ue.status != :watched OR ue.status IS NULL') ->andWhere('s.id = :showId') ->setParameters([ 'watched' => UserEpisode::STATUS_WATCHED, 'dateTo' => date("Y-m-d H:i"), 'user' => $user, 'showId' => $showId, ]) ->orderBy('e.airdate', $order) ->getQuery() ->getResult()

$this->createQueryBuilder('e') ->select('e.id, e.season, e.episode, e.airstmp, e.duration, e.name, e.summary, ue.comment') ->innerJoin('e.show', 's') ->innerJoin(UserShow::class, 'us', Join::WITH, 'us.show = e.show AND us.user = :user') ->innerJoin(User::class, 'u', Join::WITH, 'u = :user') ->leftJoin(UserEpisode::class, 'ue', Join::WITH, 'ue.user = :user AND ue.episodeID = e.id') ->andWhere('e.airstamp < ' . sprintf($this->dateSub, ':dateTo')) ->andWhere('ue.status != :watched OR ue.status IS NULL') ->andWhere('s.id = :showId') ->setParameters([ 'watched' => UserEpisode::STATUS_WATCHED, 'dateTo' => date("Y-m-d H:i"), 'user' => $user, 'showId' => $showId, ]) ->orderBy('e.airdate', $order) ->getQuery() ->getResult()

$this->createQueryBuilder('e') ->select('e.id, e.season, e.episode, e.airstmp, e.duration, e.nme, e.summary, ue.comment') ->innerJoin('e.show', 's') ->innerJoin(UserShow::class, 'us', Join::WITH, 'us.show = e.show AND us.user = :user') ->innerJoin(User::class, 'u', Join::WITH, 'u = :user') ->leftJoin(UserEpisode::class, 'ue', Join::WITH, 'ue.user = :user AND ue.episodeID = e.id') ->andWhere('e.airstamp < ' . sprintf($this->dateSub, ':dateTo')) ->andWhere('ue.status != :watched OR ue.status IS NULL') ->andWhere('s.id = :showId') ->setParameters([ 'watched' => UserEpisode::STATUS_WATCHED, 'dateTo' => date("Y-m-d H:i"), 'user' => $user, 'showId' => $showId, ]) ->orderBy('e.airdate', $order) ->getQuery() ->getResult()

$this->createQueryBuilder('us') ->select('us') ->innerJoin('us.show', 's') ->innerJoin('s.episodes', 'e') ->leftJoin(UserEpisode::class, 'ue', Join::WITH, 'ue.user = :user AND ue.episodeID = e.id AND ue.status = :watched') ->where('us.user = :user') ->andWhere('us.status is NULL') ->orWhere('us.status = :status') ->setParameters([ 'watched' => UserEpisode::STATUS_WATCHED, 'user' => $user, 'status' => $status, ]) ->groupBy('s') ->orderBy('s.status', 'desc') ->addOrderBy('s.name', 'asc') ->getQuery() ->getResult()
